name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Lift, Drag, and other Aerodynamics Forces
lessons.description: Overview of different types of aerodynamics forces.

lessons.name: Fluid Properties
lessons.description: Properties of air and other fluids relevant to aerodynamics.

lessons.name: Flow Visualization
lessons.description: Techniques for visualizing and measuring fluid flow.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Basic Concepts
lessons.description: Overview of subsonic and supersonic flow and their characteristics.

lessons.name: Basics of Subsonic Flow
lessons.description: In-depth overview of subsonic flow.

lessons.name: Basics of Supersonic Flow
lessons.description: In-depth overview of supersonic flow.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Fundamentals of Heat Transfer
lessons.description: Overview of modes of heat transfer: conduction, convection, and radiation.

lessons.name: Aerodynamic Heating Mechanisms
lessons.description: Overview of heating mechanisms.

lessons.name: Effects of Aerodynamic Heating
lessons.description: In-depth overview of effects of aerodynamic heating.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Mission Objectives and Requirements
lessons.description: Defining the purpose and objectives of the mission.

lessons.name: Orbital Mechanics and Trajectory Design
lessons.description: Fundamentals of orbital dynamics.

lessons.name: Structural Design and Analysis
lessons.description: Structural design principles for spacecraft.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Basics of Orbital Mechanics
lessons.description: Overview of the basics of orbital mechanics.

lessons.name: Trajectory analysis and optimization
lessons.description: Trajectory analysis and optimization for launch, orbit insertion, rendezvous, and interplanetary transfers.

lessons.name: Launch and Trajectory Constraints
lessons.description: Determining launch windows and trajectory constraints based on mission goals and launch vehicle capabilities.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Basics of Spacecraft Subsystems
lessons.description: Overview of spacecraft subsystems.

lessons.name: Design Considerations
lessons.description: Design considerations for each subsystem, including performance requirements, mass, volume, power consumption, and reliability.

lessons.name: Extra Constraints
lessons.description: Considerations for spacecraft stability, stiffness, and vibration isolation.
